title: NASA and Russia weigh options for astronaut return after spacecraft leak
description: Officials at NASA and Russia's space agency, Roscosmos, are working to decide how to bring home several people at the International Space Station after a Russian Soyuz spacecraft sprang a leak last week.

title: Companies are reining in holiday bonuses
description: Last year, bonuses were bountiful. This year, economic uncertainty is bringing a chill to the holiday-season perk, according to survey data released Thursday by Challenger, Gray & Christmas.

title: Why America's economy remains surprisingly strong -- but you don't realize it
description: Each week brings head-scratching contradictory news about the economy. This past week was no different, with a batch of economic reports showing that — despite the recession talk — the US economy shows remarkable resilience.

title: NFL games are coming to YouTube TV. Google gets the rights to Sunday Ticket for 2023
description: NFL Sunday Ticket is coming to YouTube TV, the NFL announced Thursday, following years of speculation about which media company would be next to broadcast all out-of-market NFL games to fans.

title: The US economy grew much faster than previously thought in the third quarter
description: America's economy grew much faster than previously thought in the third quarter, a sign that the Federal Reserve's battle to cool the economy to fight inflation t is having only limited impact.

title: Thursday flight cancellations top 1,200 nationwide, disrupting holiday travel
description: More than 1,200 flights have been cancelled across the United States, according to the flight tracking site FlightAware, as severe winter weather threatens holiday travel.

title: United Nations Security Council demands release of Myanmar's Aung San Suu Kyi in historic resolution
description: The United Nations Security Council (UNSC) has called on Myanmar's ruling military junta to release all political prisoners, including deposed State Counselor Aung San Suu Kyi and former President Win Myint, in its first resolution passed on the Southeast Asian country since its independence.
